title: Graphic Narrative Creation and Identity Reflection Project for Pre-Service English Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational English education theories and basic concepts of graphic storytelling
context.additional_context: Learners use graphic narrative creation tools on personal devices and engage in projects exploring their educational identity and diverse cultural perspectives through reflective self-examination.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their educational identity during the graphic narrative creation process and reflect it in visual and textual elements.
Learners can create stories about characters with similar or different identities and apply ethical considerations.
Learners can revise their creations based on peer feedback and evaluate their learning process through reflective journals.

resources: Digital graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Spark)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
